FuncDef:
The vpn-instance command binds a VPN instance to an IPv6 prefix pool.
The undo vpn-instance command restores the default configuration.
By default, no VPN instance is bound to an IPv6 prefix pool.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the VPN instance name.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. In addition, the VPN instance name must not be _public_. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The vpn-instance command is used to bind a VPN instance to an IPv6 prefix pool.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
